oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisements from the Murfreesboro Courier, Murfreesboro's first newspaper (1830 - 32)
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Rutherford County Historical Society Publication No. 39
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ADVERTISEMENTS FROM THE COURIER, MURFREESBORO'S FIRST NEWSPAPER (1830-32) In 1980, Rita Frost Lynch and her husband purchased the historic EzraJones house in MurfJreesboro. They later found in the attic many rare, intact copies of the Courier from the years 1830-32. She later pubUshed A Glimpse ofNews Past which contained news articles and advertisements from those pa-pers. She graciously provided these ads for this issue of the Society's journal.
